stories.text:
Paste the following into the console of any HN page - for annotated avatars on all HN comments. (self contained code)

  for(u of document.querySelectorAll('.hnuser'))for(u.parentElement.prepend(c=document.createElement('canvas')),x=c.getContext('2d'),c.width=c.height=14,s=u.innerText,r=1,i=28+s.length;i--;i<28?r>>>29>X*X/3+Y/2&&x.fillRect(6+2*X,2*Y,2,2)&x.fillRect(6-2*X,2*Y,2,2):r+=s.charCodeAt(i-28,x.fillStyle='#'+(r>>8&0xFFFFFF).toString(16)))r^=r<<13,r^=r>>>17,r^=r<<5,X=i&3,Y=i>>2
stories.title: Show HN: HN Avatars in 368 bytes

stories.text:
I see a lot comments on HN that signal a serious dislike for Pocket. It's like many here absolutely abhor it. Whenever a thread has relations with Firefox or Mozilla, many comments pop up about Pocket, and all of them are negative.

Why?

Is it simply because it is enabled by default by Firefox, or are there other reasons that I am missing?
stories.title: Ask HN: Why do many people hate Pocket?
